participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Active and health-conscious, enjoys fitness and caring for pets.
participant_1.background: two dogs live with me. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. eating is something i do when i'm bored. i have short hair. i go to the gym regularly.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Hardworking and dedicated, values family teachings and enjoys hands-on work.
participant_2.background: i'm a construction worker. my dad taught me everything i know. i enjoy building houses. my cats are very special to me.
